description: Submission of details of details and samples (where appropriate) of all external materials pursuant to condition 3; preliminary risk assessment report pursuant to condition 8; site investigation scheme pursuant to condition 9; quantitative risk assessment report pursuant to condition 10; remediation method statement pursuant to condition 11; Secure by design pursuant to condition 16; proposed refuse, recycling, food waste and cycle storage pursuant to condition 18; surface water drainage scheme, based on sustainable drainage principles pursuant to condition 20 of planning permission ref: 2022/00240/FUL granted 23rd June 2022.
